Condition.GET_INIT_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT MASTER, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR ACTIVE:#ID#, Bool) or sp0 l0 (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR ACTIVE:#ID#, Bool) ! and if{ #ID# (>K:TOGGLE_FLIGHT_DIRECTOR) } l0

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AUTOPILOT_Push_Template
UseTemplate.GET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) ! and sp0
UseTemplate.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) and if{ (>H:B777_FMC_1_AP_LOC_ARMED) } (>H:B777_FMC_1_AP_LOC_ARMED)

True.GPS_DISABLE_CODE: (A:GPS DRIVES NAV1, Bool) if{ (A:GPS APPROACH APPROACH TYPE, Enum) 4 == if{ (>K:TOGGLE_GPS_DRIVES_NAV1) } } els{ (A:GPS APPROACH APPROACH TYPE, Enum) 10 == if{ (>K:TOGGLE_GPS_DRIVES_NAV1) } }

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AUTOPILOT_Push_Template
UseTemplate.GET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) and sp0
UseTemplate.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: #GPS_DISABLE_CODE# (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) ! and if{ (>H:B777_FMC_1_AP_APP_ARMED) } (>H:B777_FMC_1_AP_APP_ARMED)

Case.EMISSIVE_CODE_ACTIVE: (A:AUTOPILOT THROTTLE ARM, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or and
Case.IS_SWITCH_ON: (A:AUTOPILOT THROTTLE ARM, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or and

False.IS_SWITCH_ON: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or
False.EMISSIVE_CODE_ACTIVE: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or

Case.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: 1 -1 p0 0 > ? sp0 #HEADING_INDEX# (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK DIR:#HEADING_INDEX#, degrees) 1 l0 * + dnor (>K:2:HEADING_BUG_SET)
1 -1 p0 0 > ? sp0 #HEADING_INDEX# (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK DIR:#HEADING_INDEX#, degrees) 1 l0 * + dnor (>K:2:HEADING_BUG_SET)
1 -1 p0 0 > ? sp0 #HEADING_INDEX# (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK DIR:#HEADING_INDEX#, degrees) 1 l0 * + dnor (>K:2:HEADING_BUG_SET)

Default.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: 1 -1 p0 0 > ? sp0 #HEADING_INDEX# (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING LOCK DIR:#HEADING_INDEX#, degrees) 1 l0 * + dnor (>K:2:HEADING_BUG_SET)

Case.TT_VALUE_BTN: (A:AUTOPILOT MANAGED SPEED IN MACH, Bool) if{ (R:1:@TT_Package.GT_STATE_MACH) } els{ (R:1:@TT_Package.GT_STATE_KNTOS) }

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AUTOPILOT_Knob_Template
UseTemplate.GET_TT_VALUE_STATE: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD VAR:#INCREMENT_INDEX#, knots) sp0 (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD VAR:#INCREMENT_INDEX#, mach) sp1
